title: 138 new infections seven died due to covid 19 in Goa on Monday | Goa NYOOOZ
description:
- Advertisement -Panaji: Goa's coronavirus caseload went up by 138 and reached 166236 on Monday a health department official said.
The death toll mounted to 3046 as seven of the patients succumbed to the infection during the day he said.
The number of recovered patients in the state rose to 160874 with 326 of them getting discharged on Monday .
The number of active cases is now 2316 the official said.
“With 2487 new tests the total number of tests conducted in the state has gone up to 913966” he added.
